Dialogue.Page: Mod: The Stranger They Are Author: Anonymous
The Stranger They Are is a story mod that greatly expands the Echoes of the Eye DLC, which unveils the darkest secrets of the Stranger's Inhabitants.
It's difficult to explain the mod any more outside of that because the mod itself is filled with a lot of huge surprises, unlike other mods.
Currently, The Stranger They Are is the longest mod on the database, with reports of playtime lasting at an average of 10 hours.
